TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You made a better decision than making this wish, then you lose your decision making superpowers.

I wish that paradoxes didn't stop time travel.

Granted they do not you just can only go one way forward.

I wish there was a private space agency that sent 3 people to the iss of their own every 10 months.

Granted. They go broke and can't afford to send the last 3 people back, so they die. Too bad you were chosen to go there...

I wish I was the best footballz.

Granted. You are sold to some kid, who hates you. He turns you into the worst footballz (using necromancy), and you spend the rest of your footballiness in a grave, being yelled at and hated every year.

I wish for magic fists like the ones on Minecraft.

Granted. But every time you try to hit someone it hits you instead

I wish I have a supercomputer in my house

Granted. Your house catches fire because of enormous amounts of heat it produces.

I wish for google goggles.

Granted. You look like an idiot now. x-]

I wish to live in a log cabin on pluto with sufficient food & air and with wi-fi.

Granted. The Great Firewall of Pluto only allows you to access MySpace and One Direction's website.

I wish I could shapeshift.

Granted: You tested your new ability by shifting into a cockroach, and then realize you could only shift once.

I wish to have my own intergalactic cargo ship which I'll know how to fly.

Granted, but you begin being trailed by Space Banditos. Happy flight! ;D

I wish I could leave the Hotel California.

Granted. Hotel California has engulfed the entire planet, and the only way you COULD leave it would be to launch a rocket and send it into Venus, which is way worse.

I wish I was launched to venus.

Granted. You are launched to Venus, but moments after stepping out of you capsule and making a monumental statement, the atmospheric heat melts your visor sucking all of the air out of your suit/lungs suffocating you to death.

I wish Kerbin was real.

Granted. The laws of physics change to accommodate its life-bearing properties, thus destroying life on earth and causing the explosion of every star (except Kerbol and some brown dwarves).

I wish that saving images was as easy as rendering images on the computer. (Only changing the properties of the first)

granted, people go blind as a result

i wish that many of the people(the people i meet day to day, definitely not the people here) were less stupid at times

Granted. You are really stupid in comparison now

I wish i had a pet rock.

Granted. It runs away.

I wish for something clever to type.

Granted:

I don't think i need to say more.

I wish for something stupid to type.

Granted, but it's in a foreign language.

I wish for a free infinite money dispenser.

Granted. It actually dispenses antimony.

I wish for less double-line enters in the internets.

Granted. It's replaced with triple line enters.

I wish for a smartphone or tablet that can play KSP.

Granted. However, the smartphone is powered by witchcraft. (Not android or intel.)

You sacrifice 3 years of your life every time you play an hour of KSP on that phone.

I wish the future came and punched everyone but me in the face.

Granted. It kicks you in the face instead.

I wish for a flashlight.

Edited May 24, 2014 by Noname117

Granted. No batteries inside.

I wish for a business class ticket from Stockholm to NY.

Granted, but the flight crashes in the Atlantic.

I wish for a personal, small, orbital rocket.

granted, the flight fails and you are left floating in space towards the sun

i wish i was made out of a neutron star
